item.title: ZeroMQ + Vagrant for Fun and Profit
item.description: ZeroMQ is a powerful library for network programming. But it’s no fun to just connecting to localhost! By building a single Ubuntu VM and saving it as a Vagrant box, we can spin up as many clients as the machine can handle! Install Ubuntu 14.04 into a VirtualBox VM Remeber to Install Ubuntu with user ‘Vagrant’ and forward port 22 to work from the host. Tested with ubuntu-14.04.3-server-amd64.iso
